name: Back Support Belt
descr:
The Chiroform Back Support
are especially designed to provide maximum relief for muscle strain and spasms. The belt deliver intra-abdominal compression that bridges your spinal column to your sacrum, thereby significantly reducing stress to your lower back. Elastic back panels with stiffeners and double side pulls for superior abdominal compression.
 
Proportionally sized for optimum fit.
 
Available sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL and XXL.
